text: Haylie Duff is a proud new mom. Duff, posted new photos of her cute baby daughter Ryan Ava to Instagram as she and fiance Matt Rosenberg took their newborn on her first family vacation to Hawaiian island Kona on Tuesday. The sixteen - week - old tot looked adorable and happy in the sweet snaps, which her smitten parents shared to social media. Cutie : Haylie Duff shared a photo of sixteen - week - old daughter Ryan Ava to Instagram on Tuesday, writing'Baby's first vacation!'Sharing a cute photo of Ryan to Instagram, Duff captioned the snap - which appeared to be a selfie as the little girl sat in her lap -'Baby's first vacation '.
